response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and durability, it's truly a value for money. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $120 for you to own this exceptional item. This offer not only ensures you get a great deal but also allows us to fairly compensate for our investment and efforts. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with an excellent opportunity to benefit from its features. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
